name: Blunderdome
description:
Instructions

- Move by swiping either up, down, left or right.

- Attack monsters by swiping into them

- If either your Heart (Red) or Soul (Green) meters reach 0 you die

- Hitting a switch will heal you 1 Heart and 1 Soul

- Hitting both switches will randomize the arena
